dmca.title: [URGENT] Unauthorized Distribution of Apple Copyrighted Material -- Immediate Action
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: Ramage, Ian [mailto:IRamage@OMM.com] 
Sent: Saturday, May 26, 2007 6:23 PM
To: contact@free-codecs.com
Cc: Abuse; Copyright
Subject: [URGENT] Unauthorized Distribution of Apple Copyrighted
Material -- Immediate Action Demanded
Importance: High

 

VIA E-MAIL 

NOT FOR POSTING 

To Whom It May Concern: 

We represent Apple Inc. ("Apple").  It has come to our attention that
your website, at
http://www.free-codecs.com/download/QuickTime_Alternative.htm/
<http://www.free-codecs.com/download/QuickTime_Alternative.htm/> , is
currently distributing a software program called "QuickTime Alternative"
(hereinafter, the "Software") in violation of Apple's intellectual
property rights.  

The Software uses codecs (encoders/decoders) and other components from
Apple's proprietary QuickTime 7 software.  Those codecs and components
are copyrighted by Apple, and any unauthorized use or distribution
thereof is strictly prohibited.  

We therefore demand that you: (i) immediately cease distributing or
offering for download the Software and all versions of it; (ii) destroy
all copies of all versions of the Software in your possession; (iii)
refrain from violating Apple's intellectual property in the future.
Please reply to this e-mail when you have complied with the first two
demands. 

Thank you in advance for your cooperation, 

/s/ Ian Ramage 

Ian Ramage
O'Melveny & Myers LLP
Embarcadero Center West
275 Battery Street, Suite 2600
San Francisco, CA 94111
Phone: 415.984.8783
Fax: 415.984.8701
iramage@omm.com

DMCA Certification: I hereby state, under penalty of perjury, that I
have a good faith belief that your activities are not authorized by
Apple, that the information in this notification is accurate, and that I
am authorized to act on behalf of Apple in this regard. 

This message and any attached documents contain information from the law
firm of O'Melveny & Myers LLP that may be confidential and/or
privileged. If you are not the intended recipient, you may not read,
copy, distribute, or use this information. If you have received this
transmission in error, please notify the sender immediately by reply
e-mail and then delete this message.
